name: 2D Shooter (Complete)
description:
This is my 2D Shooter Project.

Modifications:

1) Created additional levels each with their own unique objective, and level of progression that gets increasingly more challenging 

(players are alerted of objectives at the start of each level)

2) Reskinned the Player Ship with custom design and light animations

3) Replaced each sound effect in the game to update the sound design of the game.

 New Effect Source List:

  • PlayerHit:
  • PlayerFire:
  • EnemyFire:
  • EnemyHit:
  • GameOver: 
  • Victory: 

Credits:

Created by Tre Benson
